title: IMate2.GetUseMisalignedDeviationDocumentProperty
description: Gets whether to use the document property value for the maximum misalignment deviation of the misaligned concentric mate.
returns: True to use the document property value for maximum misalignment deviation, false to not
remarks:
If this method returns false, then the maximum deviation used is returned by
IMate2::GetMaximumMisalignedDeviation
.
